siteDescription: Community Network aims to provide public tools for different games. Starting with Battlefield, we are bringing back online concurrent player stats, as well as personal stats and much more in future.
playerNotFound: Playername not found, try another name or another game.
noName: Cannot show a playername when accessing stats via playerId

0.0: We are hosting and an active part of bfban.com - an amazing community & reverse engineering/security team created against hackers, to provide united ban list and report system.
0.1: Report cheaters in BF1/BFV, so they can be banned in community servers.

0.0: A manager for your Battlefield 1 server. Allows you to automatically kick players based on ping or based on BFBan (our global banlist). Plus it provides a way to have more than 200 banslots for your servers.
0.1: Also gives you access to the same admin-panel as in game, so you don't have to open the game. Great to have on your second monitor so you can manage your servers.

1.0: The game stats bot is a Discord bot to see any player's stats for games like Battlefield 2, 3, 4, Hardline, 1 and 5
1.1: The bot also supports console users, example: '!bf1stat {platform} {name}'

2.0: Public API to get ingame stats or serverinfo for your own project or website. It supports all the same Battlefield titles as the game stats bot.

3.0: One of our first projects was an RSP Operation server we set up together with BFBan. The goal was to make cheat free server with operations gamemode. You can find more at our Discord.

0.question: Q: Can I use your API?
0.answer: A: Yes, you can. We provide the API for free without any limitations.

1.question: Q: You have a Discord bot, but can I make my own?
1.answer: A: We provide great bot for Discord, but if you want to write your own, feel free to do so with our API.

2.question: Q: Which games are available?
2.answer: A: Our website and API support most of Battlefield games including V, 1, 4, Hardline, 3 and 2. The Discord bot also supports other games like Division or Destiny 2.

3.question: Q: Did you use to Battlefield Tracker to build all this?
3.answer: A: No. We provide independent services.

4.question: Q: I found an issue or want to suggest changes on the website, where can get in touch?
4.answer: A: Head over to our GitHub to post any issues and suggestions.

5.question: Q: Where to post issues and feature requests for the Discord bot?
5.answer: A: For suggestions regarding the bot and our API, come join our Discord.

playerSearch.description: Search for any Origin nickname to get player stats.
playerSearch.gameStatus: Amount of players on the Battlefield

serverSearch.description: Search for Battlefield servers to get playeramounts/map rotation of the server.

stats.overviewDescription: A short overview of your stats in game.

descriptions.0: This website is part of the Community Network. It is Open Source. You can post issues and suggest changes/improvements via GitHub. API provided by Community Network and open for public usage. We don’t provide any third-party API. Our back end is closed source and not available publicly.
descriptions.1: Battlefield & Origin are registered trademark of Electronic Arts. This website uses data provided pursuant to Electronic Arts’ Battlefield 1 Stats Terms. Trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Game materials copyright Electronic Arts Inc. Electronic Arts has not endorsed and is not responsible for this site or its content.
